name: Wizard Runner
description:
Use your shape shifting powers to escape the villagers!

you can transform into a frog, snake or rino.

the frog has a high jump,

the snake can climb walls,

the rino can break some walls, but cant jump.

you cant kill anyone, because you are a good wizard, so you just have to RUN!

controls:

A and D to move;

space to jump;

I J K L to transform;

W S to climb as the snake;
